languages.text: At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, fortress world characters gain stacks of never stop shooting equal to <u>(half the minimal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the most damaging {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} they used this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: At the end of their turn, fortress world characters gain stacks of never stop shooting equal to <u>(half the minimal damage of the most damaging ranged weapon they used this round)</u>.

At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, fortress world characters gain stacks of never stop shooting equal to <u>(half the minimal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the most damaging {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} they used this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g})</u>.

languages.text: 要塞世界的角色{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，会额外获得“全力开火”效果层数，等同于<u>（该角色本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内使用过的威力最大的{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程{/g}武器，其最小{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的一半）</u>。
languages.original_text: At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, fortress world characters gain stacks of never stop shooting equal to <u>(half the minimal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the most damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon they used this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: 要塞世界的角色回合结束时，会额外获得“全力开火”效果层数，等同于<u>（该角色本轮内使用过的威力最大的远程武器，其最小伤害的一半）</u>。

languages.text: Al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, los personajes de mundo fortaleza ganan acumulaciones de No dejes de disparar iguales a <u>(la mitad del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} mínimo del arma {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}a distancia{/g} más poderosa que han usado este {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g})</u>.
languages.original_text: At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, fortress world characters gain stacks of never stop shooting equal to <u>(half the minimal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the most damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon they used this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: Al final de su turno, los personajes de mundo fortaleza ganan acumulaciones de No dejes de disparar iguales a <u>(la mitad del daño mínimo del arma a distancia más poderosa que han usado este asalto)</u>.

languages.text: Am Ende ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} erhalten Bollwerkwelt-Charaktere Stapel von Nie das Schießen einstellen entsprechend <u>(Hälfte des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Minimalschadens{/g} der von ihnen in dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} genutzten {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfwaffe{/g}, die am meisten Schaden verursacht)</u>.
languages.original_text: At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, fortress world characters gain stacks of never stop shooting equal to <u>(half the minimal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the most damaging {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} they used this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: Am Ende ihres Zuges erhalten Bollwerkwelt-Charaktere Stapel von Nie das Schießen einstellen entsprechend <u>(Hälfte des Minimalschadens der von ihnen in dieser Runde genutzten Fernkampfwaffe, die am meisten Schaden verursacht)</u>.

languages.text: À la fin de leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, les personnages des mondes forteresses obtiennent un nombre de cumuls de Tirs Ininterrompus égal à <u>(la moitié des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} minimum de l'arme {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}à distance{/g} la plus dévastatrice utilisée au cours du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g})</u>.
languages.original_text: At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, fortress world characters gain stacks of never stop shooting equal to <u>(half the minimal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the most damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon they used this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: À la fin de leur tour, les personnages des mondes forteresses obtiennent un nombre de cumuls de Tirs Ininterrompus égal à <u>(la moitié des dégâts minimum de l'arme à distance la plus dévastatrice utilisée au cours du round)</u>.

languages.text: В конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж с мира-крепости получает число уровней эффекта "стрелять изо всех сил", равное <u>(половина минимального {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционного{/g} оружия, использованного персонажем в {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g}, которое нанесло максимальный урон)</u>.
languages.original_text: At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, fortress world characters gain stacks of never stop shooting equal to <u>(half the minimal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the most damaging {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} they used this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: В конце своего хода персонаж из мира-крепости получает число уровней эффекта "стрелять изо всех сил", равное <u>(половина минимального урона дистанционного оружия, использованного персонажем в раунде, которое нанесло максимальный урон)</u>.

languages.text: 彼らの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終わりに、要塞惑星のキャラクターは<u>(この{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で使った最も{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えた{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}遠隔{/g}武器の最小ダメージの半分)</u>と同等のネバーストップ・シューティングのスタックを得る。
languages.original_text: At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, fortress world characters gain stacks of never stop shooting equal to <u>(half the minimal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the most damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon they used this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: 彼らのターンの終わりに、要塞惑星のキャラクターは<u>(このラウンドで使った最もダメージを与えた遠隔武器の最小ダメージの半分)</u>と同等のネバーストップ・シューティングのスタックを得る。
